legendaryActions.name: Move
legendaryActions.description: Sorin moves up to his spee without provoking oppurtunity attacks

legendaryActions.name: Melee Attack
legendaryActions.description: Sorin makes one unarmed strike of Rapier attack

abilities.name: Damage Resistances
abilities.description: Necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

abilities.name: Shapechanger
abilities.description:
If Sorin isn't in sunlight or running water, he can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny Bat or a Medium Cloud of Mist, or back into his true form.
While in bat form, Sorin can't speak, his walking speed is 5 ft, and he has a flying speed of 30 ft. His other statistics remain unchanged. Anything he is wearing transforms with him, but nothing he is carrying does. He reverts to his true form if he dies.
While in mist form, Sorin can't take actions, speak, or manipulate objects. He is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 ft, can hoverm and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a spacem the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and is immune to all magical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
abilities.description: If Sorin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Misty Escape
abilities.description: Uneeded for Sorin, but keep for future vampire stat blocks

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Sorin regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if he has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If Sorin takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, the trait doesn't function at the start of Sorin's next turn.

abilities.name: Spellcasting
abilities.description:
Sorin is a 9th level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Sorin has the following spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): pick 3
1st Level (4 slots): pick 3
2nd Level (3 slots): pick 3
3rd Level (3 slots): pick 3
4th Level (3 slots): pick 2
5th Level (1 slot): pick 1

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Sorin makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.
